docs.text: Mixed Reality in Education Welcome to my final year project repository. This project is looking into the application of Mixed Reality (MR) using the Microsoft Hololens 2 in education, particularly training programmes. Firefighting Training Simulation App This app will try to apply MR in assisting firefighting training programmes in the form of a Firefighting Training Simulation(FTS). Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
